languages.text: {n}Вам доводилось слышать про технологию мыслеблока. Воспоминания о событиях или времени помещались под особый замок, раскрываемый лишь специальной фразой. Которую, вероятнее всего, знала только Теодора.{/n}

{n}You have heard about mindlock technology. The subject's memories of times or events would be placed under a special lock that could only be opened by a key phrase, one that most likely only Theodora would know.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вам доводилось слышать про технологию мыслеблока. Воспоминания о событиях или времени помещались под особый замок, раскрываемый лишь специальной фразой. Которую, вероятнее всего, знала только Теодора.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You have heard about the mindlock technology. The memories of the times or events were placed under a special lock, that could only be unlocked by a key phrase — one that most likely only Theodora would know.{/n}

{n}You have heard about the mindlock technology. The memories of the times or events were placed under a special lock, that could only be unlocked by a key phrase — one that most likely only Theodora would know.{/n}

{n}You have heard about the mindlock technology. The memories of the times or events were put under a special lock that could only be cracked by a key phrase, one that most likely only Theodora would know.{/n}

{n}You have heard about the mindlock technology. The memories of the times or events were put under a special lock that could only be cracked by a key phrase, one that most likely only Theodora would know.{/n}

{n}You have heard about mindlock technology. The subject's memories of times or events would be placed under a special lock that could only be opened by a key phrase, one that most likely only Theodora would know.{/n}

{n}You have heard about mindlock technology. The subject's memories of times or events would be placed under a special lock that could only be opened by a key phrase, one that most likely only Theodora would know.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous avez entendu parler de la technologie de verrouillage mental : les souvenirs de certains moments ou événements ne sont accessibles qu'à l'aide d'une phrase clé. Dans ce cas précis, Théodora devait être la seule à connaître cette phrase.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have heard about mindlock technology. The subject's memories of times or events would be placed under a special lock that could only be opened by a key phrase, one that most likely only Theodora would know.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous avez entendu parler de la technologie de verrouillage mental : il est possible de bloquer les souvenirs de certains moments ou événements, qui ne sont alors accessibles qu'à l'aide d'une phrase clé. Dans ce cas précis, Théodora devait être la seule à connaître cette phrase.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ya has oído hablar de la tecnología del bloqueo mental. Los recuerdos del sujeto de ciertos acontecimientos o períodos se protegen con un bloqueo especial que solo puede desactivarse con una frase específica, probablemente una que en este caso solo conociera Theodora.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have heard about mindlock technology. The subject's memories of times or events would be placed under a special lock that could only be opened by a key phrase, one that most likely only Theodora would know.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ya has oído hablar de la tecnología del bloqueo mental. Los recuerdos de ciertos acontecimientos se protegen con un bloqueo especial que solo puede desactivarse con una frase específica, probablemente una que en este caso solo conociera Theodora.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你听说过心灵锁这种技术。这种技术用来存放特定的记忆，只有通过某个关键词语才能打开。至于这个词语，恐怕只有西奥多拉本人知道。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have heard about mindlock technology. The subject's memories of times or events would be placed under a special lock that could only be opened by a key phrase, one that most likely only Theodora would know.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你听说过心灵锁这种技术。这种技术用来存放特定的记忆，只有通过某个关键词语才能打开。至于这个词语，恐怕只有西奥多拉本人知道。{/n}

languages.text: {n}マインドロック技術のことは聞いたことがあるだろう。被験者の時代や出来事の記憶は特別なロックがかけられていて、おそらくシオドーラだけが知っているキーフレーズでしか解読できないのさ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have heard about mindlock technology. The subject's memories of times or events would be placed under a special lock that could only be opened by a key phrase, one that most likely only Theodora would know.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マインドロック技術のことは聞いたことがあるだろう。その時代や出来事の記憶は特別なロックがかけられていて、おそらくテオドラだけが知っているキーフレーズでしか解読できないのさ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du hast von der Gedankensperre-Technologie gehört. Die Erinnerungen an Zeiten oder Ereignisse werden hinter ein spezielles Schloss gesperrt, das sich nur mit einem Losungswort knacken lasst. Und dieses Losungswort kannte vermutlich nur Theodora.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have heard about mindlock technology. The subject's memories of times or events would be placed under a special lock that could only be opened by a key phrase, one that most likely only Theodora would know.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hast von der Gedankensperre-Technologie gehört. Die Erinnerungen an Zeiten oder Ereignisse werden hinter ein spezielles Schloss gesperrt, das sich nur mit einem Losungswort knacken lasst. Und dieses Losungswort kannte vermutlich nur Theodora.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zihin kilidi teknolojisini daha önce duymuştun. Şahsın bir zamana veya olaya dair hatıraları, anahtar bir sözle açılabilen özel bir kilide vuruluyor. Bu sözü muhtemelen sadece Theodora biliyordur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have heard about mindlock technology. The subject's memories of times or events would be placed under a special lock that could only be opened by a key phrase, one that most likely only Theodora would know.{/n}
